title: Drawing, "Elevation of an Apartment Building, Société Immobilière, rue Moderne (now rue Agar)", 1909–11
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on tracing paper
signed: Top right below inscription: monogram: "G" in double circle
inscribed: Top of drawing in black ink: SOCIETE IMMOBLIERE DE LA RUE MODERNE/RUE MODERNE 4/ NO. 7; below inscription on left in black ink is a g placed within a  double circle.
description: Elevation of the facade of a narrow apartment building. Rough stone indicated at base of building. Paper cut around building and inscription.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of an Apartment Building, Société Immobilière, rue Moderne (now rue Agar)", 1909–11.
1909–11. Pen and black ink, graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-11.
